title: tannam taniyAi
sahitya:
tannam taniyAi vanda ennait-tazhuvik-koLLuvAi duraiyE


anupallavi

  unnaiyE gatiyena nambiyE Urum pErum uravum turandE


caraNam    iruLum puyalum iDimaiyum inavashaigaLum poruttEn iru vikAra bandha donda 
iDargaLai maruttEn aruLE tuNai enruNarndE anbup-paDagil AshaiyuDanE
